accessCodeDescription: To access the system, the user must register using the code provided above. You can print the registration instructions, which will include this code.
accessClick: Click to show the activation code.
accessInstructionsWarning: Some of the selected users already have activated access or it is blocked. These users will be omitted from instructions printing.
archiveEmployeeDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to move the employee to the archive?
blockedAccessInfo: The user's access to the system has been blocked by the administrator. To unblock access, a new activation code must be generated. The user will have to go through the access activation process again.
unarchiveEmployeeDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to unarchive the employee?
addUnitToComplex: Add unit to the school complex
employeesDescription: This view allows you to manage employees — add them, change their data, manage their activity in the system. To manage an employee, click on a table row.
institutionType.complementaryGeneralSeco: Complementary general secondary school for vocational graduates
name: Name
printAlert: Print the generated instructions or close the print window in your browser (in the print tab) to continue.
schoolStructureDescription: In this view, you can manage the school structure - add, archive units, and change their data.
subjectsDescription: Manage the list of items available in the register.
systemAccessDescription: In this view, you can manage user access to the system.
archiveUnitDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to archive the entity?
archiveUnitDialogDescription: No journals or ledgers can be modified in an archived entity; the data is read-only. Archiving is recommended only for entities that have been liquidated. To confirm the archiving of the entity, enter your password.
unarchiveUnitDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to unarchive the unit?
requiredUnitComplexDialogDescription: To create a second school unit, you need to create a school complex that will contain all school units. Continue to create a school complex.
